trans-unit.source: Inserted into a Web page as a placeholder when the attempt to load or create a new instance of a dynamic <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control has failed.
trans-unit.target: Satt inn i en nettside som plassholder under forsøket på å laste inn eller Opprett en ny forekomst av en dynamisk <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> kontrollen mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart class is used by the Web Parts control set as a placeholder for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that could not be added to the page.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ErrorWebPart brukes av webdeler kontrollen som er angitt som en plassholder for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrolltypen ikke kan legge til siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control attempts to load or create a new instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone, and the attempt fails for some reason, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> method, and inserts an ErrorWebPart control in place of the control that failed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen prøver å laste inn eller Opprett en ny forekomst av en dynamisk <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontrollen i en sone, og forsøket mislykkes på grunn av noen av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kaller deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A>metoden og setter inn en ErrorWebPart kontrollerer i stedet for kontrollen som kan.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CreateErrorWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart control is inserted to preserve previously existing personalization state information that might have existed on a control for users.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollen ErrorWebPart settes Hvis du vil beholde tidligere eksisterende tilpassing tilstandsinformasjon som kan ha fantes på en kontroll for brukere.

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose there is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that has a personalizable property, so that users can save their own ZIP Code, and then the control can automatically display weather information for that ZIP Code each time the user visits the page.
trans-unit.target: Eksempel: Det er en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll som har en egenskap for bruke personlige data, slik at brukere kan lagre sine egne postnummer, og deretter kontrollen kan automatisk opplysninger Vær for som postnummer hver gang brukeren besøker siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If at some point a problem occurs with the weather control so that it cannot be loaded during a specific request, and yet the rest of the page does load successfully, the custom personalization data that a user has saved for that control would be lost the next time the personalization data for the page is saved.
trans-unit.target: Hvis på et bestemt tidspunkt oppstår et problem med Vær kontrollen slik at den ikke kan lastes inn under en bestemt forespørsel, og ennå resten av siden laster inn, egendefinerte personlige data som en bruker er lagret for at kontrollen vil gå tapt neste gang personlige data for siden er lagret.

trans-unit.source: By inserting the ErrorWebPart control in place of the failed control, you can notify the user that a problem has occurred, and also provide a mechanism for the Web Parts control set to preserve the user's personalization data on the failed control until the problem can be corrected.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn ErrorWebPart kontrollen i stedet mislykket kontrollen, kan varsle bruker som har oppstått et problem, og også mekanisme for webdeler kontrollen er satt til beholde brukerens personlige data mislykket kontrollen før problemet kan løses.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart class derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart> class, as one of several types designed to be temporary placeholders for other types.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ErrorWebPart er avledet fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>klasse som én av flere typer som er utformet for å være midlertidig plassholdere for andre typer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart>

trans-unit.source: To create an instance of the class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control uses its public <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en forekomst av klassen, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen bruker offentlige <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: The constructor requires several details of the failed control to be passed to it, such as the ID, the original type of the control (if the failed control is a server or user control wrapped in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object), the original path to the source file for the control (if the failed control is a user control), and the ID of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object if present.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren krever flere detaljer om mislykket kontrollen som skal sendes, for eksempel ID, opprinnelige kontrolltypen (Hvis mislykket kontrollen er en server eller kontroll omsluttet en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>objektet), opprinnelige banen til kildefilen for kontrollen (Hvis mislykket kontrollen er en kontroll), og IDen for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>objektet hvis den finnes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart class has a single public property called <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ErrorWebPart har en enkelt offentlig egenskap kalt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Developers can assign a value to this property that will be displayed in a Web page when the control is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan tilordne en verdi for denne egenskapen skal vises i en webside når kontrollen er satt inn.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart class has three protected methods.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ErrorWebPart har tre beskyttede metoder.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A> method takes style characteristics from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zone that contains the control that failed to load.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A>metoden bruker stilen fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A>objekt den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>sone som inneholder kontrollen som kan ikke laste inn.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.AddAttributesToRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: If any style settings exist in this object, the method applies them to the ErrorWebPart control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes innstillingene i dette objektet, gjelder metoden dem ErrorWebPart kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A> method sets several important inherited properties on the ErrorWebPart control, to prevent users from personalizing the control by hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting it, or changing its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A>metoden angir flere viktige arvede egenskaper på kontrollen ErrorWebPart, for å forhindre brukere fra å tilpasse kontrollen ved skjule, minimere, redigere, eller eksporterer den, eller endre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A> method encodes the value of the string in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property, to prevent rendering problems or scripting attacks.
trans-unit.target: Til slutt den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A>metoden koder verdien for strengen i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen for å forhindre gjengivelse problemer eller skripting angrep.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.RenderContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control when it fails in an attempt to load or create an instance of a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>kontrollen oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>kontrollerer når den ikke i et forsøk på å laste inn eller opprette en forekomst av en dynamisk <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Dynamic controls are controls that are added to a page programmatically, or by a user who adds the control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Dynamiske kontroller er kontroller som er lagt til en side programmatisk, eller av en bruker som legger til kontrollen fra en katalog med kontroller, i motsetning til statiske kontroller som er deklarert i koden for en webside.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorWebPart method simply creates an instance of the base class, passing to it the four parameters that contain information about the failed control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ErrorWebPart ganske enkelt oppretter en forekomst av basisklassen sende til den de fire parameterne som inneholder informasjon om kontrollen mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the control ID (not the unique ID) of the failing control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som er i kontrollen kontroll-IDen (ikke den unike IDen) mislyktes.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control is involved in the failure, the ID is the ID of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> kontrollen er involvert i feilen, IDen er IDen for den underordnede serverkontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A string that is the name of the <xref:System.Type> of the failed control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som er navnet på den <xref:System.Type>kontrollens mislyktes.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control is involved in the failure, the type name is the type of its child server control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> kontrollen er involvert i feilen, typenavn er kontrolltypen den underordnede server.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to a user control, if a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control that contains a child user control is involved in the failure.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder banen til en brukerkontroll, hvis en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> kontroll som inneholder en underordnet brukerkontroll er involvert i feilen.

trans-unit.source: A string that returns the ID of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"></xref> control, if that type of control was involved in the failure to load or create a control.
trans-unit.target: En streng som returnerer IDen til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart"> </xref> kontrollerer om kontrolltypen er involvert i kan ikke laste inn eller Opprett en kontroll.

trans-unit.source: This is needed for controls that do not inherit from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> base class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er nødvendig for kolonner som ikke arver fra den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> basisklasse.

trans-unit.source: Applies special error style attributes to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart"></xref> object that is inserted into a page in place of another control.
trans-unit.target: Bruker spesielle feil stil attributtene til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart"> </xref> objektet som settes inn i en side i stedet for en annen kontroll.

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method takes the style characteristics (if any) that are defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> zone that contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden AddAttributesToRender tar stilen (Hvis noen) som er definert i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A>objekt den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>sone som inneholder en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.ErrorStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The styles are applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control prior to rendering.
trans-unit.target: Malene anvendes på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>kontrollen før gjengivelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the HTML output to be rendered.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som inneholder HTML sender som skal gjengis.

trans-unit.source: Sets several important properties on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart"></xref> control prior to rendering, to prevent users from being able to personalize the control.
trans-unit.target: Angir flere viktige egenskaper i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart"> </xref> kontrollen før gjengivelse for å forhindre brukere fra å kunne tilpasse kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The EndLoadPersonalization method sets properties on an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control before it is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EndLoadPersonalization egenskapene på en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>kontrollerer før den gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: These properties prevent users from hiding, minimizing, editing, or exporting the control, or changing its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Disse egenskapene forhindre brukere fra å skjule, minimere, redigere, eksporterer kontrollen, eller endre den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, users can close or delete an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control instance.
trans-unit.target: Brukere kan imidlertid lukke eller slette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>kontroll-forekomsten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the error message that is displayed in a Web page in place of a control that could not be successfully added to the page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir feilmeldingen som vises i en webside i stedet for en kontroll som ikke kan være lagt til siden.

trans-unit.source: The ErrorMessage property can be assigned a value by a developer, so that a custom error message is displayed at the point where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart> control is inserted into a page.
trans-unit.target: ErrorMessage-egenskapen kan tilordnes noen verdi av en utvikler, slik at en egendefinert feilmelding punktet der den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>kontrollen er satt inn i en side.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text of the error message.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder teksten i feilmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a culture-specific error message.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en feil knyttet til kultur-melding.

trans-unit.source: Encodes the string value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage*> property.
trans-unit.target: Koder strengverdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage*>

trans-unit.source: The RenderContents method encodes the string assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A> property to ensure that it renders properly, and to protect against script injection attacks.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderContents koder streng som er tilordnet av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>egenskapen slik at den gjengir riktig, og for å beskytte mot skriptet innsetting angrep.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.ErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that encodes the error message.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som koder feilmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er lagt til bare for å implementere den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er lagt til bare for å implementere den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"></xref> interface and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"> </xref> grensesnittet og kall den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ErrorWebPart.EndLoadPersonalization*>

trans-unit.source: This method is added only to implement the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er lagt til bare for å implementere den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ITrackingPersonalizable"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control tracks the status of its changes.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen sporer status for endringene.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Web Parts control is responsible for determining when the control is considered changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis webdeler kontrollen er ansvarlig for å bestemme når kontrollen anses endret. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
